title: Festival of Awakening
description: A grand celebration marking the first full moon of Concis in Year 76. Traditional dances and offerings to The Phoenix are common.

title: Day of Hiraeth Reckoning
description: The designated 'current day' for this calendar version. A day for reflection and planning.

title: Concis Full Moon Vigil
description: A solemn vigil held on the last day of Concis, under the light of the full moon Luminus, preparing for the transition to Rifis.

title: Rifis Frog Leap Contest
description: A playful contest held in early Rifis, celebrating the season's namesake zodiac. Participants often engage in transmutation challenges.

title: Year 76 Commencement
description: The official start of Year 76 in Hiraeth.
